name: The Sphere Experience with Darren Aronofsky's Postcard From Earth
promoters: [{'id': '494', 'name': 'PROMOTED BY VENUE', 'description': 'PROMOTED BY VENUE / NTL / USA'}]
info: This event is an immersive experience that may include elements such as seat haptics, movement sensations, flashing lights, intense lighting, visual effects, loud noises, and atmospheric simulations such as scent and wind. Such elements may aggravate certain medical or physical conditions, and guests should take into consideration if they have a history of discomfort or physical symptoms when experiencing these elements. If you are pregnant, you should consult with your physician prior to attending the event. Postcard From Earth is intended for guests aged 6+. All guests require a ticket. Tickets start at $69 (before fees). For the most premium viewing experience, select our World Origin section seating (Sections 206 and 306). For group orders of 10 tickets or more, please contact the Group Sales department at groups@sphere.vegas or 725-258-7775.
pleaseNote: The Sphere Experience is a two-part multi-sensory experience lasting approximately two hours. The program begins in the Atrium when doors open at the time listed on your ticket and is curated by five humanoid robots   named Aura   that serve as interactive guides to Sphere. The Atrium experience also includes a 360-degree avatar capture; a 50-foot holographic installation; artwork created by machine learning; and an interactive demonstration of Sphere Immersive Sound powered by HOLOPLOT. Approximately an hour after your ticketed time, The Sphere Experience continues in the main venue bowl with a multi-sensory cinematic experience at an unparalleled scale   Darren Aronofsky s Postcard from Earth. This specially commissioned film is a portrait of our planet, re-imagined as a sci-fi experience. It takes advantage of all of Sphere s experiential technologies to transport audiences and engage the senses, making you feel like you have traveled to new worlds without ever leaving your seats.
accessibility: {'info': 'Accessible seating may be secured through Ticketmaster or by contacting the Sphere Disabled Services Department at disabledservices@msg.com or 725-258-6724, Monday through Friday between 6:00 a.m. and 5:00 p.m. PT, and Saturday and Sunday between 7:00 a.m. and 5:00 p.m. PT. The program begins in the Atrium when doors open at the time listed on your ticket and is curated by five humanoid robots   named Aura   that serve as interactive guides to Sphere. The Atrium experience also includes a 360-degree avatar capture; a 50-foot holographic installation; artwork created by machine learning; and an interactive demonstr ation of Sphere Immersive Sound powered by HOLOPLOT. Approximately an hour after your ticketed time, The Sphere Experience continues in the main venue bowl with a multi-sensory cinematic experience at an unparalleled scale   Darren Aronofsky s Postcard from Earth. This specially commissioned film is a portrait of our planet, re-imagined as a sci-fi experience. It takes advantage of all of Sphere s experiential technologies to transport audiences and engage the senses, making you feel like you ha ve traveled to new worlds without ever leaving your seat
accessibility: {'info': 'Accessible and companion seating are available via the Sphere Disabled Serviced Department. Don’t see any seating available here? Please call 725.258.6724 to learn about available accessible seating options.'}

name: The Sphere Experience with Darren Aronofsky's Postcard From Earth
promoters: [{'id': '494', 'name': 'PROMOTED BY VENUE', 'description': 'PROMOTED BY VENUE / NTL / USA'}]
info: This event is an immersive experience that may include elements such as seat haptics, movement sensations, flashing lights, intense lighting, visual effects, loud noises, and atmospheric simulations such as scent and wind. Such elements may aggravate certain medical or physical conditions, and guests should take into consideration if they have a history of discomfort or physical symptoms when experiencing these elements. If you are pregnant, you should consult with your physician prior to attending the event. Postcard From Earth is intended for guests aged 6+. All guests require a ticket. Tickets start at $69 (before fees). For the most premium viewing experience, select our World Origin section seating (Sections 206 and 306). For group orders of 10 tickets or more, please contact the Group Sales department at groups@sphere.vegas or 725-258-7775.

promoters: [{'id': '494', 'name': 'PROMOTED BY VENUE', 'description': 'PROMOTED BY VENUE / NTL / USA'}]
info: This event is an immersive experience that may include elements such as seat haptics, movement sensations, flashing lights, intense lighting, visual effects, loud noises, and atmospheric simulations such as scent and wind. Such elements may aggravate certain medical or physical conditions, and guests should take into consideration if they have a history of discomfort or physical symptoms when experiencing these elements. If you are pregnant, you should consult with your physician prior to attending the event. Postcard From Earth is intended for guests aged 6+. All guests require a ticket. Tickets start at $69 (before fees). For the most premium viewing experience, select our World Origin section seating (Sections 206 and 306). For group orders of 10 tickets or more, please contact the Group Sales department at groups@sphere.vegas or 725-258-7775.
pleaseNote: The Sphere Experience is a two-part multi-sensory experience lasting approximately two hours. The program begins in the Atrium when doors open at the time listed on your ticket and is curated by five humanoid robots   named Aura   that serve as interactive guides to Sphere. The Atrium experience also includes a 360-degree avatar capture; a 50-foot holographic installation; artwork created by machine learning; and an interactive demonstration of Sphere Immersive Sound powered by HOLOPLOT. Approximately an hour after your ticketed time, The Sphere Experience continues in the main venue bowl with a multi-sensory cinematic experience at an unparalleled scale   Darren Aronofsky s Postcard from Earth. This specially commissioned film is a portrait of our planet, re-imagined as a sci-fi experience. It takes advantage of all of Sphere s experiential technologies to transport audiences and engage the senses, making you feel like you have traveled to new worlds without ever leaving your seats.

The Atrium experience also includes a 360-degree avatar capture; a 50-foot holographic installation; artwork created by machine learning; and an interactive demonstration of Sphere Immersive Sound powered by HOLOPLOT. Approximately an hour after your ticketed time, The Sphere Experience continues in the main venue bowl with a multi-sensory cinematic experience at an unparalleled scale   Darren Aronofsky s Postcard from Earth. This specially commissioned film is a portrait of our planet, re-imagined as a sci-fi experience. It takes advantage of all of Sphere s experiential technologies to transport audiences and engage the senses, making you feel like you have traveled to new worlds without ever leaving your seats.

Such elements may aggravate certain medical or physical conditions, and guests should take into consideration if they have a history of discomfort or physical symptoms when experiencing these elements. If you are pregnant, you should consult with your physician prior to attending the event. Postcard From Earth is intended for guests aged 6+. All guests require a ticket. Tickets start at $69 (before fees). For the most premium viewing experience, select our World Origin section seating (Sections 206 and 306). For group orders of 10 tickets or more, please contact the Group Sales department at groups@sphere.vegas or 725-258-7775.
pleaseNote: The Sphere Experience is a two-part multi-sensory experience lasting approximately two hours. The program begins in the Atrium when doors open at the time listed on your ticket and is curated by five humanoid robots   named Aura   that serve as interactive guides to Sphere. The Atrium experience also includes a 360-degree avatar capture; a 50-foot holographic installation; artwork created by machine learning; and an interactive demonstration of Sphere Immersive Sound powered by HOLOPLOT. Approximately an hour after your ticketed time, The Sphere Experience continues in the main venue bowl with a multi-sensory cinematic experience at an unparalleled scale   Darren Aronofsky s Postcard from Earth. This specially commissioned film is a portrait of our planet, re-imagined as a sci-fi experience. It takes advantage of all of Sphere s experiential technologies to transport audiences and engage the senses, making you feel like you have traveled to new worlds without ever leaving your seats.
accessibility: {'info': 'Accessible seating may be secured through Ticketmaster or by contacting the Sphere Disabled Services Department at disabledservices@msg.com or 725-258-6724, Monday through Friday between 6:00 a.m. and 5:00 p.m. PT, and Saturday and Sunday between 7:00 a.m. and 5:00 p.m. PT. For additional information click here.', 'ticketLimit': 8, 'url': 'https://www.thespherevegas.com/accessibility-services', 'urlText': 'For additional information click here.'}

pleaseNote: The Sphere Experience is a two-part multi-sensory experience lasting approximately two hours. The program begins in the Atrium when doors open at the time listed on your ticket and is curated by five humanoid robots   named Aura   that serve as interactive guides to Sphere. The Atrium experience also includes a 360-degree avatar capture; a 50-foot holographic installation; artwork created by machine learning; and an interactive demonstration of Sphere Immersive Sound powered by HOLOPLOT. Approximately an hour after your ticketed time, The Sphere Experience continues in the main venue bowl with a multi-sensory cinematic experience at an unparalleled scale   Darren Aronofsky s Postcard from Earth. This specially commissioned film is a portrait of our planet, re-imagined as a sci-fi experience. It takes advantage of all of Sphere s experiential technologies to transport audiences and engage the senses, making you feel like you have traveled to new worlds without ever leaving your seats.

The Atrium experience also includes a 360-degree avatar capture; a 50-foot holographic installation; artwork created by machine learning; and an interactive demonstration of Sphere Immersive Sound powered by HOLOPLOT. Approximately an hour after your ticketed time, The Sphere Experience continues in the main venue bowl with a multi-sensory cinematic experience at an unparalleled scale   Darren Aronofsky s Postcard from Earth. This specially commissioned film is a portrait of our planet, re-imagined as a sci-fi experience. It takes advantage of all of Sphere s experiential technologies to transport audiences and engage the senses, making you feel like you have traveled to new worlds without ever leaving your seats.

promoters: [{'id': '494', 'name': 'PROMOTED BY VENUE', 'description': 'PROMOTED BY VENUE / NTL / USA'}]
info: This event is an immersive experience that may include elements such as seat haptics, movement sensations, flashing lights, intense lighting, visual effects, loud noises, and atmospheric simulations such as scent and wind. Such elements may aggravate certain medical or physical conditions, and guests should take into consideration if they have a history of discomfort or physical symptoms when experiencing these elements. If you are pregnant, you should consult with your physician prior to attending the event. Postcard From Earth is intended for guests aged 6+. All guests require a ticket. Tickets start at $69 (before fees). For the most premium viewing experience, select our World Origin section seating (Sections 206 and 306). For group orders of 10 tickets or more, please contact the Group Sales department at groups@sphere.vegas or 725-258-7775.
pleaseNote: The Sphere Experience is a two-part multi-sensory experience lasting approximately two hours. The program begins in the Atrium when doors open at the time listed on your ticket and is curated by five humanoid robots   named Aura   that serve as interactive guides to Sphere. The Atrium experience also includes a 360-degree avatar capture; a 50-foot holographic installation; artwork created by machine learning; and an interactive demonstration of Sphere Immersive Sound powered by HOLOPLOT. Approximately an hour after your ticketed time, The Sphere Experience continues in the main venue bowl with a multi-sensory cinematic experience at an unparalleled scale   Darren Aronofsky s Postcard from Earth. This specially commissioned film is a portrait of our planet, re-imagined as a sci-fi experience. It takes advantage of all of Sphere s experiential technologies to transport audiences and engage the senses, making you feel like you have traveled to new worlds without ever leaving your seats.

pleaseNote: The Sphere Experience is a two-part multi-sensory experience lasting approximately two hours. The program begins in the Atrium when doors open at the time listed on your ticket and is curated by five humanoid robots   named Aura   that serve as interactive guides to Sphere. The Atrium experience also includes a 360-degree avatar capture; a 50-foot holographic installation; artwork created by machine learning; and an interactive demonstr ation of Sphere Immersive Sound powered by HOLOPLOT. Approximately an hour after your ticketed time, The Sphere Experience continues in the main venue bowl with a multi-sensory cinematic experience at an unparalleled scale   Darren Aronofsky s Postcard from Earth. This specially commissioned film is a portrait of our planet, re-imagined as a sci-fi experience. It takes advantage of all of Sphere s experiential technologies to transport audiences and engage the senses, making you feel like you ha ve traveled to new worlds without ever leaving your seat
accessibility: {'info': 'Accessible and companion seating are available via the Sphere Disabled Serviced Department. Don’t see any seating available here? Please call 725.258.6724 to learn about available accessible seating options.'}

name: The Sphere Experience with Darren Aronofsky's Postcard From Earth
promoters: [{'id': '494', 'name': 'PROMOTED BY VENUE', 'description': 'PROMOTED BY VENUE / NTL / USA'}]
info: This event is an immersive experience that may include elements such as seat haptics, movement sensations, flashing lights, intense lighting, visual effects, loud noises, and atmospheric simulations such as scent and wind. Such elements may aggravate certain medical or physical conditions, and guests should take into consideration if they have a history of discomfort or physical symptoms when experiencing these elements. If you are pregnant, you should consult with your physician prior to attending the event. Postcard From Earth is intended for guests aged 6+. All guests require a ticket. Tickets start at $69 (before fees). For the most premium viewing experience, select our World Origin section seating (Sections 206 and 306). For group orders of 10 tickets or more, please contact the Group Sales department at groups@sphere.vegas or 725-258-7775.

name: The Sphere Experience with Darren Aronofsky's Postcard From Earth
promoters: [{'id': '494', 'name': 'PROMOTED BY VENUE', 'description': 'PROMOTED BY VENUE / NTL / USA'}]
info: This event is an immersive experience that may include elements such as seat haptics, movement sensations, flashing lights, intense lighting, visual effects, loud noises, and atmospheric simulations such as scent and wind. Such elements may aggravate certain medical or physical conditions, and guests should take into consideration if they have a history of discomfort or physical symptoms when experiencing these elements. If you are pregnant, you should consult with your physician prior to attending the event. Postcard From Earth is intended for guests aged 6+. All guests require a ticket. Tickets start at $69 (before fees). For the most premium viewing experience, select our World Origin section seating (Sections 206 and 306). For group orders of 10 tickets or more, please contact the Group Sales department at groups@sphere.vegas or 725-258-7775.
pleaseNote: The Sphere Experience is a two-part multi-sensory experience lasting approximately two hours. The program begins in the Atrium when doors open at the time listed on your ticket and is curated by five humanoid robots   named Aura   that serve as interactive guides to Sphere. The Atrium experience also includes a 360-degree avatar capture; a 50-foot holographic installation; artwork created by machine learning; and an interactive demonstration of Sphere Immersive Sound powered by HOLOPLOT. Approximately an hour after your ticketed time, The Sphere Experience continues in the main venue bowl with a multi-sensory cinematic experience at an unparalleled scale   Darren Aronofsky s Postcard from Earth. This specially commissioned film is a portrait of our planet, re-imagined as a sci-fi experience. It takes advantage of all of Sphere s experiential technologies to transport audiences and engage the senses, making you feel like you have traveled to new worlds without ever leaving your seats.

promoters: [{'id': '494', 'name': 'PROMOTED BY VENUE', 'description': 'PROMOTED BY VENUE / NTL / USA'}]
info: This event is an immersive experience that may include elements such as seat haptics, movement sensations, flashing lights, intense lighting, visual effects, loud noises, and atmospheric simulations such as scent and wind. Such elements may aggravate certain medical or physical conditions, and guests should take into consideration if they have a history of discomfort or physical symptoms when experiencing these elements. If you are pregnant, you should consult with your physician prior to attending the event. Postcard From Earth is intended for guests aged 6+. All guests require a ticket. Tickets start at $69 (before fees). For the most premium viewing experience, select our World Origin section seating (Sections 206 and 306). For group orders of 10 tickets or more, please contact the Group Sales department at groups@sphere.vegas or 725-258-7775.
pleaseNote: The Sphere Experience is a two-part multi-sensory experience lasting approximately two hours. The program begins in the Atrium when doors open at the time listed on your ticket and is curated by five humanoid robots   named Aura   that serve as interactive guides to Sphere. The Atrium experience also includes a 360-degree avatar capture; a 50-foot holographic installation; artwork created by machine learning; and an interactive demonstration of Sphere Immersive Sound powered by HOLOPLOT. Approximately an hour after your ticketed time, The Sphere Experience continues in the main venue bowl with a multi-sensory cinematic experience at an unparalleled scale   Darren Aronofsky s Postcard from Earth. This specially commissioned film is a portrait of our planet, re-imagined as a sci-fi experience. It takes advantage of all of Sphere s experiential technologies to transport audiences and engage the senses, making you feel like you have traveled to new worlds without ever leaving your seats.

name: The Sphere Experience with Darren Aronofsky's Postcard From Earth
promoters: [{'id': '494', 'name': 'PROMOTED BY VENUE', 'description': 'PROMOTED BY VENUE / NTL / USA'}]
info: This event is an immersive experience that may include elements such as seat haptics, movement sensations, flashing lights, intense lighting, visual effects, loud noises, and atmospheric simulations such as scent and wind. Such elements may aggravate certain medical or physical conditions, and guests should take into consideration if they have a history of discomfort or physical symptoms when experiencing these elements. If you are pregnant, you should consult with your physician prior to attending the event. Postcard From Earth is intended for guests aged 6+. All guests require a ticket. Tickets start at $69 (before fees). For the most premium viewing experience, select our World Origin section seating (Sections 206 and 306). For group orders of 10 tickets or more, please contact the Group Sales department at groups@sphere.vegas or 725-258-7775.
pleaseNote: The Sphere Experience is a two-part multi-sensory experience lasting approximately two hours. The program begins in the Atrium when doors open at the time listed on your ticket and is curated by five humanoid robots   named Aura   that serve as interactive guides to Sphere. The Atrium experience also includes a 360-degree avatar capture; a 50-foot holographic installation; artwork created by machine learning; and an interactive demonstration of Sphere Immersive Sound powered by HOLOPLOT. Approximately an hour after your ticketed time, The Sphere Experience continues in the main venue bowl with a multi-sensory cinematic experience at an unparalleled scale   Darren Aronofsky s Postcard from Earth. This specially commissioned film is a portrait of our planet, re-imagined as a sci-fi experience. It takes advantage of all of Sphere s experiential technologies to transport audiences and engage the senses, making you feel like you have traveled to new worlds without ever leaving your seats.

Approximately an hour after your ticketed time, The Sphere Experience continues in the main venue bowl with a multi-sensory cinematic experience at an unparalleled scale   Darren Aronofsky s Postcard from Earth. This specially commissioned film is a portrait of our planet, re-imagined as a sci-fi experience. It takes advantage of all of Sphere s experiential technologies to transport audiences and engage the senses, making you feel like you have traveled to new worlds without ever leaving your seats.

name: The Sphere Experience with Darren Aronofsky's Postcard From Earth
promoters: [{'id': '494', 'name': 'PROMOTED BY VENUE', 'description': 'PROMOTED BY VENUE / NTL / USA'}]
info: This event is an immersive experience that may include elements such as seat haptics, movement sensations, flashing lights, intense lighting, visual effects, loud noises, and atmospheric simulations such as scent and wind. Such elements may aggravate certain medical or physical conditions, and guests should take into consideration if they have a history of discomfort or physical symptoms when experiencing these elements. If you are pregnant, you should consult with your physician prior to attending the event. Postcard From Earth is intended for guests aged 6+. All guests require a ticket. Tickets start at $69 (before fees). For the most premium viewing experience, select our World Origin section seating (Sections 206 and 306). For group orders of 10 tickets or more, please contact the Group Sales department at groups@sphere.vegas or 725-258-7775.
pleaseNote: The Sphere Experience is a two-part multi-sensory experience lasting approximately two hours. The program begins in the Atrium when doors open at the time listed on your ticket and is curated by five humanoid robots   named Aura   that serve as interactive guides to Sphere. The Atrium experience also includes a 360-degree avatar capture; a 50-foot holographic installation; artwork created by machine learning; and an interactive demonstration of Sphere Immersive Sound powered by HOLOPLOT. Approximately an hour after your ticketed time, The Sphere Experience continues in the main venue bowl with a multi-sensory cinematic experience at an unparalleled scale   Darren Aronofsky s Postcard from Earth. This specially commissioned film is a portrait of our planet, re-imagined as a sci-fi experience. It takes advantage of all of Sphere s experiential technologies to transport audiences and engage the senses, making you feel like you have traveled to new worlds without ever leaving your seats.
accessibility: {'info': 'Accessible seating may be secured through Ticketmaster or by contacting the Sphere Disabled Services Department at disabledservices@msg.com or 725-258-6724, Monday through Friday between 6:00 a.m. and 5:00 p.m. PT, and Saturday and Sunday between 7:00 a.m. and 5:00 p.m. PT. For additional information click here.', 'ticketLimit': 8, 'url': 'https://www.thespherevegas.com/accessibility-services', 'urlText': 'For additional information click here.'}

name: The Sphere Experience with Darren Aronofsky's Postcard From Earth
promoters: [{'id': '494', 'name': 'PROMOTED BY VENUE', 'description': 'PROMOTED BY VENUE / NTL / USA'}]
info: This event is an immersive experience that may include elements such as seat haptics, movement sensations, flashing lights, intense lighting, visual effects, loud noises, and atmospheric simulations such as scent and wind. Such elements may aggravate certain medical or physical conditions, and guests should take into consideration if they have a history of discomfort or physical symptoms when experiencing these elements. If you are pregnant, you should consult with your physician prior to attending the event. Postcard From Earth is intended for guests aged 6+. All guests require a ticket. Tickets start at $69 (before fees). For the most premium viewing experience, select our World Origin section seating (Sections 206 and 306). For group orders of 10 tickets or more, please contact the Group Sales department at groups@sphere.vegas or 725-258-7775.
pleaseNote: The Sphere Experience is a two-part multi-sensory experience lasting approximately two hours. The program begins in the Atrium when doors open at the time listed on your ticket and is curated by five humanoid robots   named Aura   that serve as interactive guides to Sphere. The Atrium experience also includes a 360-degree avatar capture; a 50-foot holographic installation; artwork created by machine learning; and an interactive demonstration of Sphere Immersive Sound powered by HOLOPLOT. Approximately an hour after your ticketed time, The Sphere Experience continues in the main venue bowl with a multi-sensory cinematic experience at an unparalleled scale   Darren Aronofsky s Postcard from Earth. This specially commissioned film is a portrait of our planet, re-imagined as a sci-fi experience. It takes advantage of all of Sphere s experiential technologies to transport audiences and engage the senses, making you feel like you have traveled to new worlds without ever leaving your seats.

pleaseNote: The Sphere Experience is a two-part multi-sensory experience lasting approximately two hours. The program begins in the Atrium when doors open at the time listed on your ticket and is curated by five humanoid robots   named Aura   that serve as interactive guides to Sphere. The Atrium experience also includes a 360-degree avatar capture; a 50-foot holographic installation; artwork created by machine learning; and an interactive demonstr ation of Sphere Immersive Sound powered by HOLOPLOT. Approximately an hour after your ticketed time, The Sphere Experience continues in the main venue bowl with a multi-sensory cinematic experience at an unparalleled scale   Darren Aronofsky s Postcard from Earth. This specially commissioned film is a portrait of our planet, re-imagined as a sci-fi experience. It takes advantage of all of Sphere s experiential technologies to transport audiences and engage the senses, making you feel like you ha ve traveled to new worlds without ever leaving your seat

name: The Sphere Experience with Darren Aronofsky's Postcard From Earth
promoters: [{'id': '494', 'name': 'PROMOTED BY VENUE', 'description': 'PROMOTED BY VENUE / NTL / USA'}]
info: This event is an immersive experience that may include elements such as seat haptics, movement sensations, flashing lights, intense lighting, visual effects, loud noises, and atmospheric simulations such as scent and wind. Such elements may aggravate certain medical or physical conditions, and guests should take into consideration if they have a history of discomfort or physical symptoms when experiencing these elements. If you are pregnant, you should consult with your physician prior to attending the event. Postcard From Earth is intended for guests aged 6+. All guests require a ticket. Tickets start at $69 (before fees). For the most premium viewing experience, select our World Origin section seating (Sections 206 and 306). For group orders of 10 tickets or more, please contact the Group Sales department at groups@sphere.vegas or 725-258-7775.
pleaseNote: The Sphere Experience is a two-part multi-sensory experience lasting approximately two hours. The program begins in the Atrium when doors open at the time listed on your ticket and is curated by five humanoid robots   named Aura   that serve as interactive guides to Sphere. The Atrium experience also includes a 360-degree avatar capture; a 50-foot holographic installation; artwork created by machine learning; and an interactive demonstration of Sphere Immersive Sound powered by HOLOPLOT. Approximately an hour after your ticketed time, The Sphere Experience continues in the main venue bowl with a multi-sensory cinematic experience at an unparalleled scale   Darren Aronofsky s Postcard from Earth. This specially commissioned film is a portrait of our planet, re-imagined as a sci-fi experience. It takes advantage of all of Sphere s experiential technologies to transport audiences and engage the senses, making you feel like you have traveled to new worlds without ever leaving your seats.
accessibility: {'info': 'Accessible seating may be secured through Ticketmaster or by contacting the Sphere Disabled Services Department at disabledservices@msg.com or 725-258-6724, Monday through Friday between 6:00 a.m. and 5:00 p.m. PT, and Saturday and Sunday between 7:00 a.m. and 5:00 p.m. PT. info: This event is an immersive experience that may include elements such as seat haptics, movement sensations, flashing lights, intense lighting, visual effects, loud noises, and atmospheric simulations such as scent and wind. Such elements may aggravate certain medical or physical conditions, and guests should take into consideration if they have a history of discomfort or physical symptoms when experiencing these elements. If you are pregnant, you should consult with your physician prior to attending the event. Postcard From Earth is intended for guests aged 6+. All guests require a ticket. Tickets start at $69 (before fees). For the most premium viewing experience, select our World Origin section seating (Sections 206 and 306). For group orders of 10 tickets or more, please contact the Group Sales department at groups@sphere.vegas or 725-258-7775.
pleaseNote: The Sphere Experience is a two-part multi-sensory experience lasting approximately two hours. The program begins in the Atrium when doors open at the time listed on your ticket and is curated by five humanoid robots   named Aura   that serve as interactive guides to Sphere. The Atrium experience also includes a 360-degree avatar capture; a 50-foot holographic installation; artwork created by machine learning; and an interactive demonstration of Sphere Immersive Sound powered by HOLOPLOT. Approximately an hour after your ticketed time, The Sphere Experience continues in the main venue bowl with a multi-sensory cinematic experience at an unparalleled scale   Darren Aronofsky s Postcard from Earth. This specially commissioned film is a portrait of our planet, re-imagined as a sci-fi experience. It takes advantage of all of Sphere s experiential technologies to transport audiences and engage the senses, making you feel like you have traveled to new worlds without ever leaving your seats.

name: The Sphere Experience with Darren Aronofsky's Postcard From Earth
promoters: [{'id': '494', 'name': 'PROMOTED BY VENUE', 'description': 'PROMOTED BY VENUE / NTL / USA'}]
info: This event is an immersive experience that may include elements such as seat haptics, movement sensations, flashing lights, intense lighting, visual effects, loud noises, and atmospheric simulations such as scent and wind. Such elements may aggravate certain medical or physical conditions, and guests should take into consideration if they have a history of discomfort or physical symptoms when experiencing these elements. If you are pregnant, you should consult with your physician prior to attending the event. Postcard From Earth is intended for guests aged 6+. All guests require a ticket. Tickets start at $69 (before fees). For the most premium viewing experience, select our World Origin section seating (Sections 206 and 306). For group orders of 10 tickets or more, please contact the Group Sales department at groups@sphere.vegas or 725-258-7775.
pleaseNote: The Sphere Experience is a two-part multi-sensory experience lasting approximately two hours. The program begins in the Atrium when doors open at the time listed on your ticket and is curated by five humanoid robots   named Aura   that serve as interactive guides to Sphere. The Atrium experience also includes a 360-degree avatar capture; a 50-foot holographic installation; artwork created by machine learning; and an interactive demonstration of Sphere Immersive Sound powered by HOLOPLOT. Approximately an hour after your ticketed time, The Sphere Experience continues in the main venue bowl with a multi-sensory cinematic experience at an unparalleled scale   Darren Aronofsky s Postcard from Earth. This specially commissioned film is a portrait of our planet, re-imagined as a sci-fi experience. It takes advantage of all of Sphere s experiential technologies to transport audiences and engage the senses, making you feel like you have traveled to new worlds without ever leaving your seats.

info: This event is an immersive experience that may include elements such as seat haptics, movement sensations, flashing lights, intense lighting, visual effects, loud noises, and atmospheric simulations such as scent and wind. Such elements may aggravate certain medical or physical conditions, and guests should take into consideration if they have a history of discomfort or physical symptoms when experiencing these elements. If you are pregnant, you should consult with your physician prior to attending the event. Postcard From Earth is intended for guests aged 6+. All guests require a ticket. Tickets start at $69 (before fees). For the most premium viewing experience, select our World Origin section seating (Sections 206 and 306). For group orders of 10 tickets or more, please contact the Group Sales department at groups@sphere.vegas or 725-258-7775.
pleaseNote: The Sphere Experience is a two-part multi-sensory experience lasting approximately two hours. The program begins in the Atrium when doors open at the time listed on your ticket and is curated by five humanoid robots   named Aura   that serve as interactive guides to Sphere. The Atrium experience also includes a 360-degree avatar capture; a 50-foot holographic installation; artwork created by machine learning; and an interactive demonstration of Sphere Immersive Sound powered by HOLOPLOT. Approximately an hour after your ticketed time, The Sphere Experience continues in the main venue bowl with a multi-sensory cinematic experience at an unparalleled scale   Darren Aronofsky s Postcard from Earth. This specially commissioned film is a portrait of our planet, re-imagined as a sci-fi experience. It takes advantage of all of Sphere s experiential technologies to transport audiences and engage the senses, making you feel like you have traveled to new worlds without ever leaving your seats.

If you are pregnant, you should consult with your physician prior to attending the event. Postcard From Earth is intended for guests aged 6+. All guests require a ticket. Tickets start at $69 (before fees). For the most premium viewing experience, select our World Origin section seating (Sections 206 and 306). For group orders of 10 tickets or more, please contact the Group Sales department at groups@sphere.vegas or 725-258-7775.
pleaseNote: The Sphere Experience is a two-part multi-sensory experience lasting approximately two hours. The program begins in the Atrium when doors open at the time listed on your ticket and is curated by five humanoid robots   named Aura   that serve as interactive guides to Sphere. The Atrium experience also includes a 360-degree avatar capture; a 50-foot holographic installation; artwork created by machine learning; and an interactive demonstration of Sphere Immersive Sound powered by HOLOPLOT. Approximately an hour after your ticketed time, The Sphere Experience continues in the main venue bowl with a multi-sensory cinematic experience at an unparalleled scale   Darren Aronofsky s Postcard from Earth. This specially commissioned film is a portrait of our planet, re-imagined as a sci-fi experience. It takes advantage of all of Sphere s experiential technologies to transport audiences and engage the senses, making you feel like you have traveled to new worlds without ever leaving your seats.

Such elements may aggravate certain medical or physical conditions, and guests should take into consideration if they have a history of discomfort or physical symptoms when experiencing these elements. If you are pregnant, you should consult with your physician prior to attending the event. Postcard From Earth is intended for guests aged 6+. All guests require a ticket. Tickets start at $69 (before fees). For the most premium viewing experience, select our World Origin section seating (Sections 206 and 306). For group orders of 10 tickets or more, please contact the Group Sales department at groups@sphere.vegas or 725-258-7775.
pleaseNote: The Sphere Experience is a two-part multi-sensory experience lasting approximately two hours. The program begins in the Atrium when doors open at the time listed on your ticket and is curated by five humanoid robots   named Aura   that serve as interactive guides to Sphere. The Atrium experience also includes a 360-degree avatar capture; a 50-foot holographic installation; artwork created by machine learning; and an interactive demonstration of Sphere Immersive Sound powered by HOLOPLOT. Approximately an hour after your ticketed time, The Sphere Experience continues in the main venue bowl with a multi-sensory cinematic experience at an unparalleled scale   Darren Aronofsky s Postcard from Earth. This specially commissioned film is a portrait of our planet, re-imagined as a sci-fi experience. It takes advantage of all of Sphere s experiential technologies to transport audiences and engage the senses, making you feel like you have traveled to new worlds without ever leaving your seats.
accessibility: {'info': 'Accessible seating may be secured through Ticketmaster or by contacting the Sphere Disabled Services Department at disabledservices@msg.com or 725-258-6724, Monday through Friday between 6:00 a.m. and 5:00 p.m. PT, and Saturday and Sunday between 7:00 a.m. and 5:00 p.m. PT. For additional information click here.', 'ticketLimit': 8, 'url': 'https://www.thespherevegas.com/accessibility-services', 'urlText': 'For additional information click here.'}

The Atrium experience also includes a 360-degree avatar capture; a 50-foot holographic installation; artwork created by machine learning; and an interactive demonstration of Sphere Immersive Sound powered by HOLOPLOT. Approximately an hour after your ticketed time, The Sphere Experience continues in the main venue bowl with a multi-sensory cinematic experience at an unparalleled scale   Darren Aronofsky s Postcard from Earth. This specially commissioned film is a portrait of our planet, re-imagined as a sci-fi experience. It takes advantage of all of Sphere s experiential technologies to transport audiences and engage the senses, making you feel like you have traveled to new worlds without ever leaving your seats.

info: This event is an immersive experience that may include elements such as seat haptics, movement sensations, flashing lights, intense lighting, visual effects, loud noises, and atmospheric simulations such as scent and wind. If you are pregnant, you should consult with your physician prior to attending the event. Postcard From Earth is intended for guests aged 6+. All guests require a ticket. Tickets start at $69 (before fees). For the most premium viewing experience, select our World Origin section seating (Sections 206 and 306). For group orders of 10 tickets or more, please contact the Group Sales department at groups@sphere.vegas or 725-258-7775.

If you are pregnant, you should consult with your physician prior to attending the event. Postcard From Earth is intended for guests aged 6+. All guests require a ticket. Tickets start at $69 (before fees). For the most premium viewing experience, select our World Origin section seating (Sections 206 and 306). For group orders of 10 tickets or more, please contact the Group Sales department at groups@sphere.vegas or 725-258-7775.
pleaseNote: The Sphere Experience is a two-part multi-sensory experience lasting approximately two hours. The program begins in the Atrium when doors open at the time listed on your ticket and is curated by five humanoid robots   named Aura   that serve as interactive guides to Sphere. The Atrium experience also includes a 360-degree avatar capture; a 50-foot holographic installation; artwork created by machine learning; and an interactive demonstration of Sphere Immersive Sound powered by HOLOPLOT. Approximately an hour after your ticketed time, The Sphere Experience continues in the main venue bowl with a multi-sensory cinematic experience at an unparalleled scale   Darren Aronofsky s Postcard from Earth. This specially commissioned film is a portrait of our planet, re-imagined as a sci-fi experience. It takes advantage of all of Sphere s experiential technologies to transport audiences and engage the senses, making you feel like you have traveled to new worlds without ever leaving your seats.

If you are pregnant, you should consult with your physician prior to attending the event. Postcard From Earth is intended for guests aged 6+. All guests require a ticket. Tickets start at $69 (before fees). For the most premium viewing experience, select our World Origin section seating (Sections 206 and 306). For group orders of 10 tickets or more, please contact the Group Sales department at groups@sphere.vegas or 725-258-7775.
pleaseNote: The Sphere Experience is a two-part multi-sensory experience lasting approximately two hours. The program begins in the Atrium when doors open at the time listed on your ticket and is curated by five humanoid robots   named Aura   that serve as interactive guides to Sphere. The Atrium experience also includes a 360-degree avatar capture; a 50-foot holographic installation; artwork created by machine learning; and an interactive demonstration of Sphere Immersive Sound powered by HOLOPLOT. Approximately an hour after your ticketed time, The Sphere Experience continues in the main venue bowl with a multi-sensory cinematic experience at an unparalleled scale   Darren Aronofsky s Postcard from Earth. This specially commissioned film is a portrait of our planet, re-imagined as a sci-fi experience. It takes advantage of all of Sphere s experiential technologies to transport audiences and engage the senses, making you feel like you have traveled to new worlds without ever leaving your seats.

If you are pregnant, you should consult with your physician prior to attending the event. Postcard From Earth is intended for guests aged 6+. All guests require a ticket. Tickets start at $69 (before fees). For the most premium viewing experience, select our World Origin section seating (Sections 206 and 306). For group orders of 10 tickets or more, please contact the Group Sales department at groups@sphere.vegas or 725-258-7775.
pleaseNote: The Sphere Experience is a two-part multi-sensory experience lasting approximately two hours. The program begins in the Atrium when doors open at the time listed on your ticket and is curated by five humanoid robots   named Aura   that serve as interactive guides to Sphere. The Atrium experience also includes a 360-degree avatar capture; a 50-foot holographic installation; artwork created by machine learning; and an interactive demonstration of Sphere Immersive Sound powered by HOLOPLOT. Approximately an hour after your ticketed time, The Sphere Experience continues in the main venue bowl with a multi-sensory cinematic experience at an unparalleled scale   Darren Aronofsky s Postcard from Earth. This specially commissioned film is a portrait of our planet, re-imagined as a sci-fi experience. It takes advantage of all of Sphere s experiential technologies to transport audiences and engage the senses, making you feel like you have traveled to new worlds without ever leaving your seats.

If you are pregnant, you should consult with your physician prior to attending the event. Postcard From Earth is intended for guests aged 6+. All guests require a ticket. Tickets start at $69 (before fees). For the most premium viewing experience, select our World Origin section seating (Sections 206 and 306). For group orders of 10 tickets or more, please contact the Group Sales department at groups@sphere.vegas or 725-258-7775.
pleaseNote: The Sphere Experience is a two-part multi-sensory experience lasting approximately two hours. The program begins in the Atrium when doors open at the time listed on your ticket and is curated by five humanoid robots   named Aura   that serve as interactive guides to Sphere. The Atrium experience also includes a 360-degree avatar capture; a 50-foot holographic installation; artwork created by machine learning; and an interactive demonstration of Sphere Immersive Sound powered by HOLOPLOT. Approximately an hour after your ticketed time, The Sphere Experience continues in the main venue bowl with a multi-sensory cinematic experience at an unparalleled scale   Darren Aronofsky s Postcard from Earth. This specially commissioned film is a portrait of our planet, re-imagined as a sci-fi experience. It takes advantage of all of Sphere s experiential technologies to transport audiences and engage the senses, making you feel like you have traveled to new worlds without ever leaving your seats.

If you are pregnant, you should consult with your physician prior to attending the event. Postcard From Earth is intended for guests aged 6+. All guests require a ticket. Tickets start at $69 (before fees). For the most premium viewing experience, select our World Origin section seating (Sections 206 and 306). For group orders of 10 tickets or more, please contact the Group Sales department at groups@sphere.vegas or 725-258-7775.
pleaseNote: The Sphere Experience is a two-part multi-sensory experience lasting approximately two hours. The program begins in the Atrium when doors open at the time listed on your ticket and is curated by five humanoid robots   named Aura   that serve as interactive guides to Sphere. The Atrium experience also includes a 360-degree avatar capture; a 50-foot holographic installation; artwork created by machine learning; and an interactive demonstration of Sphere Immersive Sound powered by HOLOPLOT. Approximately an hour after your ticketed time, The Sphere Experience continues in the main venue bowl with a multi-sensory cinematic experience at an unparalleled scale   Darren Aronofsky s Postcard from Earth. This specially commissioned film is a portrait of our planet, re-imagined as a sci-fi experience. It takes advantage of all of Sphere s experiential technologies to transport audiences and engage the senses, making you feel like you have traveled to new worlds without ever leaving your seats.

If you are pregnant, you should consult with your physician prior to attending the event. Postcard From Earth is intended for guests aged 6+. All guests require a ticket. Tickets start at $69 (before fees). For the most premium viewing experience, select our World Origin section seating (Sections 206 and 306). For group orders of 10 tickets or more, please contact the Group Sales department at groups@sphere.vegas or 725-258-7775.
pleaseNote: The Sphere Experience is a two-part multi-sensory experience lasting approximately two hours. The program begins in the Atrium when doors open at the time listed on your ticket and is curated by five humanoid robots   named Aura   that serve as interactive guides to Sphere. The Atrium experience also includes a 360-degree avatar capture; a 50-foot holographic installation; artwork created by machine learning; and an interactive demonstration of Sphere Immersive Sound powered by HOLOPLOT. Approximately an hour after your ticketed time, The Sphere Experience continues in the main venue bowl with a multi-sensory cinematic experience at an unparalleled scale   Darren Aronofsky s Postcard from Earth. This specially commissioned film is a portrait of our planet, re-imagined as a sci-fi experience. It takes advantage of all of Sphere s experiential technologies to transport audiences and engage the senses, making you feel like you have traveled to new worlds without ever leaving your seats.

If you are pregnant, you should consult with your physician prior to attending the event. Postcard From Earth is intended for guests aged 6+. All guests require a ticket. Tickets start at $69 (before fees). For the most premium viewing experience, select our World Origin section seating (Sections 206 and 306). For group orders of 10 tickets or more, please contact the Group Sales department at groups@sphere.vegas or 725-258-7775.
pleaseNote: The Sphere Experience is a two-part multi-sensory experience lasting approximately two hours. The program begins in the Atrium when doors open at the time listed on your ticket and is curated by five humanoid robots   named Aura   that serve as interactive guides to Sphere. The Atrium experience also includes a 360-degree avatar capture; a 50-foot holographic installation; artwork created by machine learning; and an interactive demonstration of Sphere Immersive Sound powered by HOLOPLOT. Approximately an hour after your ticketed time, The Sphere Experience continues in the main venue bowl with a multi-sensory cinematic experience at an unparalleled scale   Darren Aronofsky s Postcard from Earth. This specially commissioned film is a portrait of our planet, re-imagined as a sci-fi experience. It takes advantage of all of Sphere s experiential technologies to transport audiences and engage the senses, making you feel like you have traveled to new worlds without ever leaving your seats.

If you are pregnant, you should consult with your physician prior to attending the event. Postcard From Earth is intended for guests aged 6+. All guests require a ticket. Tickets start at $69 (before fees). For the most premium viewing experience, select our World Origin section seating (Sections 206 and 306). For group orders of 10 tickets or more, please contact the Group Sales department at groups@sphere.vegas or 725-258-7775.
pleaseNote: The Sphere Experience is a two-part multi-sensory experience lasting approximately two hours. The program begins in the Atrium when doors open at the time listed on your ticket and is curated by five humanoid robots   named Aura   that serve as interactive guides to Sphere. The Atrium experience also includes a 360-degree avatar capture; a 50-foot holographic installation; artwork created by machine learning; and an interactive demonstration of Sphere Immersive Sound powered by HOLOPLOT. Approximately an hour after your ticketed time, The Sphere Experience continues in the main venue bowl with a multi-sensory cinematic experience at an unparalleled scale   Darren Aronofsky s Postcard from Earth. This specially commissioned film is a portrait of our planet, re-imagined as a sci-fi experience. It takes advantage of all of Sphere s experiential technologies to transport audiences and engage the senses, making you feel like you have traveled to new worlds without ever leaving your seats.

If you are pregnant, you should consult with your physician prior to attending the event. Postcard From Earth is intended for guests aged 6+. All guests require a ticket. Tickets start at $69 (before fees). For the most premium viewing experience, select our World Origin section seating (Sections 206 and 306). For group orders of 10 tickets or more, please contact the Group Sales department at groups@sphere.vegas or 725-258-7775.
pleaseNote: The Sphere Experience is a two-part multi-sensory experience lasting approximately two hours. The program begins in the Atrium when doors open at the time listed on your ticket and is curated by five humanoid robots   named Aura   that serve as interactive guides to Sphere. The Atrium experience also includes a 360-degree avatar capture; a 50-foot holographic installation; artwork created by machine learning; and an interactive demonstration of Sphere Immersive Sound powered by HOLOPLOT. Approximately an hour after your ticketed time, The Sphere Experience continues in the main venue bowl with a multi-sensory cinematic experience at an unparalleled scale   Darren Aronofsky s Postcard from Earth. This specially commissioned film is a portrait of our planet, re-imagined as a sci-fi experience. It takes advantage of all of Sphere s experiential technologies to transport audiences and engage the senses, making you feel like you have traveled to new worlds without ever leaving your seats.

If you are pregnant, you should consult with your physician prior to attending the event. Postcard From Earth is intended for guests aged 6+. All guests require a ticket. Tickets start at $69 (before fees). For the most premium viewing experience, select our World Origin section seating (Sections 206 and 306). For group orders of 10 tickets or more, please contact the Group Sales department at groups@sphere.vegas or 725-258-7775.
pleaseNote: The Sphere Experience is a two-part multi-sensory experience lasting approximately two hours. The program begins in the Atrium when doors open at the time listed on your ticket and is curated by five humanoid robots   named Aura   that serve as interactive guides to Sphere. The Atrium experience also includes a 360-degree avatar capture; a 50-foot holographic installation; artwork created by machine learning; and an interactive demonstration of Sphere Immersive Sound powered by HOLOPLOT. Approximately an hour after your ticketed time, The Sphere Experience continues in the main venue bowl with a multi-sensory cinematic experience at an unparalleled scale   Darren Aronofsky s Postcard from Earth. This specially commissioned film is a portrait of our planet, re-imagined as a sci-fi experience. It takes advantage of all of Sphere s experiential technologies to transport audiences and engage the senses, making you feel like you have traveled to new worlds without ever leaving your seats.

If you are pregnant, you should consult with your physician prior to attending the event. Postcard From Earth is intended for guests aged 6+. All guests require a ticket. Tickets start at $69 (before fees). For the most premium viewing experience, select our World Origin section seating (Sections 206 and 306). For group orders of 10 tickets or more, please contact the Group Sales department at groups@sphere.vegas or 725-258-7775.
pleaseNote: The Sphere Experience is a two-part multi-sensory experience lasting approximately two hours. The program begins in the Atrium when doors open at the time listed on your ticket and is curated by five humanoid robots   named Aura   that serve as interactive guides to Sphere. The Atrium experience also includes a 360-degree avatar capture; a 50-foot holographic installation; artwork created by machine learning; and an interactive demonstration of Sphere Immersive Sound powered by HOLOPLOT. Approximately an hour after your ticketed time, The Sphere Experience continues in the main venue bowl with a multi-sensory cinematic experience at an unparalleled scale   Darren Aronofsky s Postcard from Earth. This specially commissioned film is a portrait of our planet, re-imagined as a sci-fi experience. It takes advantage of all of Sphere s experiential technologies to transport audiences and engage the senses, making you feel like you have traveled to new worlds without ever leaving your seats.

If you are pregnant, you should consult with your physician prior to attending the event. Postcard From Earth is intended for guests aged 6+. All guests require a ticket. Tickets start at $69 (before fees). For the most premium viewing experience, select our World Origin section seating (Sections 206 and 306). For group orders of 10 tickets or more, please contact the Group Sales department at groups@sphere.vegas or 725-258-7775.
pleaseNote: The Sphere Experience is a two-part multi-sensory experience lasting approximately two hours. The program begins in the Atrium when doors open at the time listed on your ticket and is curated by five humanoid robots   named Aura   that serve as interactive guides to Sphere. The Atrium experience also includes a 360-degree avatar capture; a 50-foot holographic installation; artwork created by machine learning; and an interactive demonstration of Sphere Immersive Sound powered by HOLOPLOT. Approximately an hour after your ticketed time, The Sphere Experience continues in the main venue bowl with a multi-sensory cinematic experience at an unparalleled scale   Darren Aronofsky s Postcard from Earth. This specially commissioned film is a portrait of our planet, re-imagined as a sci-fi experience. It takes advantage of all of Sphere s experiential technologies to transport audiences and engage the senses, making you feel like you have traveled to new worlds without ever leaving your seats.
